description: The hospital account ID lists that are associated with payment plans attached to guarantor accounts.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated payment plan in this guarantor account's record. Together with ACCT_ID, this forms the foreign key to the HSP_GUAR_PMT_PLAN table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple hospital account IDs that are associated with the guarantor account and the payment plan from the HSP_GUAR_PMT_PLAN table.

columns.name: HB_PP_HAR
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account that is associated with this guarantor account and payment plan.
